Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Half Dozen Worlds Raided - Civilian Casualties Mounting The last two months have seen suffering and civilian casualties as several worlds in the Duchy of Andurien and the Steiner-Davion alliance were raided by the FWL. In turn, several FWL planets were counter-raided by the Steiner-Davion alliance and the Anduriens. These raids have resulted in increasing military casualties on all sides and have caused extensive damage to civilian structures, leading to numerous civilian casualties on the affected worlds.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Perhaps encouraged by the current situation in the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]], the Circinus Federation chose to raid [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Sierra],Sierra]], a border world between the Federation and the FWL. However, they were repelled by the [DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikFWLM],FWLM's]] forces on the planet, specifically the  [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikC24],5th Oriente Hussars]].

In response, the FWLM launched a counter-raid against [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Clayborne],Clayborne II]], leveling several military facilities.

This concludes the CNB December broadcast.
